page.title: 01GAZETEER OF BROUGHTON ASTLEY
page.content: {Broughton Astley}is a rural village in Leicestershire with a population of approximately 5,500.It is about 10 miles South West of{Leicester}and is within 20 miles of{Nuneaton}and{ {Coventry.London}is about 91 miles South,South East of{Broughton Astley. It is an agricultural area with a mixture of grazing and arable land. Various facilities have been added due to the expansion of the village.These include a betting office,a library,and different kinds of shops,plus a doctor's surgery.There is extensive building going on because{Broughton {Astley}is a pleasant and convenient place to live,with the M1 and M6 motorways nearby. In 1086 there were three separate villages covering{Broughton Astley. These were{Primethorpe,Sutton in the {Elms}and{Broughton Astley.}
